wikipedia_page.main: Ian Taylor (born 23 May 1948) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Aberdeen, Motherwell and St Johnstone. A left winger, he had a 12-year career in the Scottish Football League, making 195 league appearances.now lives in Prestatyn north Wales with second wife Hilary taylor
